name: Bob the Builder's Basics in Construction and Stuff
name_original: Bob the Builder's Basics in Construction and Stuff
description:
Puggycup returns with a new mod! With a remake of Bob's Basics which is better than the last 2 versions!

You don't collect sandwiches this time and you don't collect planks this time! You collect 7 tools!

Program Used:

UABE
dnSpy
UnityEX
Sony Vegas

Thanks For Playing!
